lead_paragraph: The bank hired a performance coach to motivate its employees, but a video of him hitting several with a stick provoked anger instead.

headline.print_headline: Spankings at a Bank in China, Then Anger
headline.main: Chinese Bank Spanks Workers, and the Internet Gives It a Flogging

snippet: The bank hired a performance coach to motivate its employees, but a video of him hitting several with a stick provoked anger instead.
abstract: Chinese express outrage at video of training session at Zhangze Rural and Commercial Bank in Changzhi, in which employees were publicly shamed and then spanked by performance coach; bank officials say employees who participated in sessions may be compensated.
